text: Kuma lalle ne, haƙiƙa, Mun aika a cikin kowace al'umma da wani Manzo (ya ce): "Ku bauta wa Allah, kuma ku nisanci ¦agutu." To, daga gare su akwai wanda Allah Ya shiryar, kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda ɓata ta wajaba a kansa. Sai ku yi tafiya a cikin ƙasa, sa'an nan ku duba yadda aƙibar masu ƙaryatawa ta kasance
